name: Hex Thief
description:
Sliced Tea Games presents Hex Thief, a game about a Witch trying to steal the RGB colours from other TV channels to colour her own. 

The game ties to the theme by shifting between TV channels, each with their own themes to obtain various items. These help you gain a red, green and blue gem to progress through the game and restore colour back to the Witch's TV channel.

Developers:

Matthew Cibor - Programmer

Kelton Morgan - Music & Level Design (Sci Fi & Witch Hut)

Niall Curran - Asset Creation & Level Design (Cooking Show)

James Helliwell - Audio & Design (Bank Heist)

Jay Nairin - Splash Art/Logo Design
